Present, Future Giving                                          Home / Events / Co-Op Internship Information Session                         Events                                                             Co-Op Internship Information Session                      Repeats every week  until Tue May 28 2013 . Tuesday, March 5, 2013 - 11:00am - 12:00pm EST                             Location: Jacobs Building, JB359 Brooklyn , NY , US              Website: http://engineering.nyu.edu/business/career/              Contact: Andrea Tider atider@poly.edu 718-260-3898                   Polytechnic Institute of NYU’s Cooperative Education Program provides an exciting opportunity for students to gain valuable work experience while learning real-world professional skills. Students who successfully complete the program will receive a notation on their transcript.   All students interested in participating in the Co-Op Program should attend this session at the start of the Co-Op Registration Process as Step 1.   These sessions have limited space, please RSVP on NYU CareerNet .
